resources.string: - Tap and drag on the screen to rotate the entire cube
Swipe anywhere on the screen to quickly rotate the closest face
- The color of the button represents the square at the center of the face to be rotated
- There are buttons on both sides, and each side indicates the direction in which the cube face will rotate
- "Shuffle" indicates how many rotations the cube will perform to be mixed before the game starts
- "Speed" indicates how fast the cube will rotate when the screen is touched and dragged
- "Size" indicates the size of the cube that will be displayed on the screen
